creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
signed: Signature on attached sheet: 小野忠重, Ono Tadashige | also signed LRC on front: Ono | Title, Date on attached sheet: 一九七三年作　八五年　加刻新刷
text: From the second edition of 50, newly printed from additional blocks in 1985. The first edition of 30 was printed in 1973.
title: Birds' Wake
